name: Straight Wave Trail
description: Customize your wave trail. This has a lot of features

speed.name: Color Change Speed
speed.description: This is how fast the wave cycles through colors.

wave-pulse-size.name: Wave Pulse Size
wave-pulse-size.description: The size of the wave trails pulsing effect.

wave-trail-size.name: Wave Trail Size
wave-trail-size.description: The size of the wave trail.

smooth.name: Smooth Color Changing
smooth.description: Makes the transition between colors a lot more smooth

persist-wave-trail.name: Persistent Wave Trail
persist-wave-trail.description: The wave trail persists after exiting the wave

editor-trail.name: Editor Trail
editor-trail.description: Show the wave trail in the editor

saturation.name: Saturation
saturation.description: The saturation of the wave trail colors

mirror-players.name: Mirror the Players
mirror-players.description: Mirror the player colors in dual mode.

no-reg-trail.name: No Regular Trail
no-reg-trail.description: Disables the regular trail while the wave

solid-wave-trail.name: Solid Wave Trail
solid-wave-trail.description: Disable blending on the wave trail.

use-gradient.name: Enable the Gradient
use-gradient.description: Enables the usage of the colors in the below setting instead of a vanilla rainbow

colors-list.name: Gradient Colors
colors-list.description: the colors to use for the wave trail

chaos.name: Enable the Randomizer
chaos.description: chaos insues when enabled (randomizes the placement of every point on the wave trail)

min-y-pos-offset.name: Min Y pos offset
min-y-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-y-pos-offset.name: Max Y pos offset
max-y-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

min-x-pos-offset.name: Min X pos offset
min-x-pos-offset.description: the minimum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-x-pos-offset.name: Max X pos offset
max-x-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-wave-pulse-size.name: Max Wave Pulse Size
max-wave-pulse-size.description: the maximum size the wave trail can pulse to

min-wave-pulse-size.name: Min Wave Pulse Size
min-wave-pulse-size.description: the minimum size the wave trail can pulse to

max-wave-trail-size.name: Max Wave Trail Size
max-wave-trail-size.description: the maximum size the wave trail can be

min-wave-trail-size.name: Min Wave Trail Size
min-wave-trail-size.description: the minimum size the wave trail can be

skip-chance.name: Skip Chance
skip-chance.description: the chance that a point will be skipped

ambience.name: Enable Ambience
ambience.description: Enable ambience for the wave trail

channel-begin.name: Channel Min
channel-begin.description: The channel at the start of the range

channel-end.name: Channel Max
channel-end.description: The channel at the end of the range
